name: Killage People
description:
You are a captain and the leader of a Tropical Island, and your villagers have decided that life on the island is not good enough for them, so sacrifices must be made! (not from our side of course)

Travel across an ocean and find people that your villagers can sacrifice for the greater good or greater boats!
But don't forget to feed your villagers as well! only a well-fed villager is a good villager.

GamePlay:

Point and Click to where you want the boat to go 

Click and hold works as well ! 

Collect Villagers from other Islands  

Go fishing to feed the Villagers

Return the goods to your Island! 

The game works as an asynchronous multiplayer. All of the people who connect are stored the ocean,  so it is highly possible to see your friends islands as well!
